tool.name: xcms-group-peaks
tool.description: Group (or align) peaks using the XCMS `group` generic method.

param.name: xcms_group_peaks_input_1
param.label: XCMS-Set file
param.help: A rdata file containing one XCMS-Set of multiple XCMS-Set objects

param.name: bandwidth
param.label: Bandwidth
param.help: Bandwidth (standard deviation or half width at half maximum) of gaussian smoothing kernel to apply to the peak density chromatogram

param.name: mzwid
param.label: MzWid
param.help: Width of overlapping m/z slices to use for creating peak density chromatograms and grouping peaks across samples

===================== XMCS Group Peaks =====================
----------- Description -----------
| The module groupds peaks from different samples together. As input XCMS-Set objects are provided which were grouped together by **xcms-collect-peaks** and pre-processed by e.g. **xcms-correct-rt**
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) XCMS-Set file | rdata | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
XCMS-Set file | A rdata file containing one XCMS-Set of multiple XCMS-Set objects |
Bandwidth | Bandwidth (standard deviation or half width at half maximum) of gaussian smoothing kernel to apply to the peak density chromatogram |
MzWid | Width of overlapping m/z slices to use for creating peak density chromatograms and grouping peaks across samples |
------------ Output files ------------
xcms_group_peaks_output_1.rdata | A rdata file containing one XCMS-Set of multiple XCMS-Set objects |
